Once Upon a Time in Anatolia

Rank: 360


A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.


Director: Nuri Bilge Ceylan

Writer: Ebru Ceylan, Nuri Bilge Ceylan, Ercan Kesal

Stars: Muhammet Uzuner, Yilmaz Erdogan, Taner Birsel

Tags: Cop Drama, Police Procedural, Psychological Thriller, Crime, Drama, Thriller
